message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take this $1,000 and let's call it a day.
Let's split it a bit more fairly, 60-40 is a good compromise.
I think 70/30 is a fair split. I'm willing to go down from my previous offer, but I need a bit more than 40%.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your last one. 55-45 is a fair split.
